div.bibl: LIETUVA, Vol. XV, No. 18, 6-4, 1906. THE FAMOUS RUSSIAN WRITER AND REVOLUTIONIST, MAXIM GORKY IN CHICAGO.

body.p: Maxim Gorky is coming to Chicago, and will deliver lectures on May 6th, at the following places: West-side Auditorium, Center Avenue and Taylor Streets, at 2:00 P.M., and Turner Hall, North Clark Street, at 4:00 P.M. Admission is 25 cents. Lithuanians should not miss seeing the famous writer and revolutionist. Besides Maxim Gorky, there will be other great speakers.
